discord.command.description.register: Adds the informed Minecraft account to the server whitelist
discord.command.description.userinfo: Shows information about the given user
discord.command.description.userinfo.arg: The user to show the information about
discord.command.description.modify: Modifies the whitelist entry for the given user, adds one if none is found
discord.command.description.modify.argum: The Discord user to modify the entry of
The username to whitelist for the given user
discord.command.register.success.title: Welcome to the group!
discord.command.register.success.message:
Your Minecraft account has been added to the whitelist.

_Please remember that you can always get your entry removed if you break any rule._
discord.command.register.last_steps.mess:
You request has been accepted.
Please wait while I add you to the server whitelist.
I'll let you know when everything is done.
discord.command.register.username_alread: The username you inserted is already whitelisted on the server.
discord.command.register.player_banned.t: You seem to be banned from the server
discord.command.register.player_banned.m: Sorry, but I could not add you to the whitelist as you are banned from the server.
discord.command.register.already_registe: You already have an account registered. Extra accounts aren't supported.
discord.command.register.same_username.m: Your linked account is already the same as the one you're trying to register. If you want to change it run the command again with the new username.
discord.command.register.locked.title: You can't do that yet
discord.command.register.locked.message:
Your entry is currently locked, the account will be unlocked %s.
Until then you can't change the linked account.
discord.command.register.fatal.title: Something went badly wrong
discord.command.register.fatal:
I could not add you to the whitelist.
Please contact a moderator.

```%s```
discord.command.register.invalid_usernam:
The username you inserted is not valid, a **Minecraft Java Edition** username must contain:
* Only alphanumerical characters (A-Z 0-9) upper or lower case
* No spaces or special characters, by the exception of _
* 3-16 characters
discord.command.register.fail.not_allowe: Sorry, but I couldn't accept your request

It seems that you don't have the required subscription/member level or don't have your Twitch/Youtube account linked to your Discord account.
Please note that it may take up to an hour for Discord to give you the role
discord.command.register.fail.account_da:
I couldn't get the public account data of `%s`. Is it a valid **Minecraft Java Edition** username?
_It is only possible to register Minecraft Java Edition accounts._
